overview.heading: San Jose Virtual Offices
overview.body: Enjoy the prestige of an illustrious business address in San Jose without the financial burdens tied to a physical office space. Opus VO affords you the rare chance to root your organization in an outstanding San Jose setting, all without the substantial costs that come with a conventional office lease. Benefit from our state-of-the-art conference rooms for key business negotiations and important client engagements, while elevating your brand with an esteemed San Jose address.  Opting for a virtual office in San Jose through Opus VO equips you with the specialized service of a live receptionist committed to delivering tailor-made, first-class customer service. Our team assures that every client interaction is fully aligned with your specific business goals. Offload everyday administrative tasks such as handling digital mail and complex call-forwarding to us, granting you the freedom to focus solely on your business’ upward trajectory.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in San Jose, California even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of San Jose. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within California.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our San Jose virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why San Jose?
sections.body: San Jose is far more than the heart of Silicon Valley; it’s a dynamic business landscape teeming with opportunities in technology, healthcare, and a variety of other sectors. Conveniently located near significant business centers, our San Jose office allows you smooth access to essential industry contacts and invigorating networking events.  By electing to have an Opus Virtual Office in San Jose, you’re not merely minimizing your operational expenses; you’re capturing a crucial competitive advantage. Propel your enterprise to unprecedented heights by taking advantage of our top-of-the-line virtual office services today.  Choose from two of Opus VOs San Jose locations @196 N 3rd Street, San Jose, CA 95112 or @ 123 E. San Carlos Street, San Jose, CA 95112
